column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////This was the first time visiting. The hostess seated us right away
column2: it was close to the main door and it was cold because of everyone coming in and out. The waiter came right away and asked for our drink order
column3: he explained the special of the day. We opted for the special
column4: New York strip with long green beans
column7: everything was great except for the cold air coming through the door. The parking was a little bit of hassle unless you went with Valet parking. The restaurant was a little hard to find
column8: all they had was a large B on outside of the building until you got to the front door and there was the name of the restaurant
column9: it was in a strip with other businesses. We will come back.
